Module org.crudeemail
Package org.crudeemail.mail

Class MailAccount

java.lang.Object
org.crudeemail.mail.MailAccount
public class MailAccount
extends java.lang.Object

MailAccount

Class that represents an email account. Stores all data related for processing the email account. The provider is determined through the string that is passed through when an object of the class is being instantiated.
Version:
1.0
